title: Ummm will project skins get on sale when it comes out?
body: Will the project skins be on sale on its first week of release? if its yes then how long the sale will be going?

replies.body:
Hiya! The pricing for the first two weeks of the PROJECT: skins are as follows - 

First Strike // 9/8 - 9/15 23:59 PDT
1350 RP: PROJECT: Fiora // PROJECT: Zed // PROJECT: Lucian // PROJECT: Leona 
1820 RP: PROJECT: Yi 

Week Two // 9/17 00:01 PDT - 9/24 23:59 PDT
975 RP: PROJECT: Fiora // PROJECT: Zed // PROJECT: Lucian // PROJECT: Leona 
1820 RP: PROJECT: Yi 

TL;DR - They'll be on sale the second week. If you buy them during the first week at full price, you get the First Strike loading screen. As Nexustect said, PROJECT: Yasuo is on sale, but he will not receive a First Strike loading screen.
so is that mean the skins will release today at anytime?
Yup, they're coming out today!
Any idea on the ETA? I've been just sitting on my client refreshing the shop for the last 4 hours.... :)
Soon!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=l0T36wJZ,comment-id=00010001000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-08T21:24:19.027+0000)
>
> Soon!

As in, 33 mins soon? :D
Mayyyybe!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=l0T36wJZ,comment-id=0001000100000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-09-08T21:41:53.208+0000)
>
> Mayyyybe!

Oh, I love you so much.
Can we stay logged in when the skins are activated or do we need to relog once they are activated?
You should just need to refresh the store.
Hype Train is Real and it makes us insane
I feel like they should be out right now I WAAAANNNNTTT THEM!
iiight i guess i need to save up now XD. Thanks for the info :)

You're welcome! 

Which skin are you most excited for? I've got my eye on Fiora.~

I've got my eye on Fiora too...

Well...a certain part of her, at least...

<.< >.>
SAMEEEEE
Umm maybe Project skin Lucian XD. Wait what about Project skin Yasuo? Will it be on sale too?
PROJECT: Yasuo is 50% off.
I think we all know why.
that leona one, also lucians is sweet
Fiora's first strike thing is amazing compared to the other ones. If Yi had more of a green theme I would have had to bring out my wallet to get that extra little bit I would need for him...

To get the loading screen will i need to purchase all the skins or is only one needed?
Just to clarify if i get the yi skin which does not decrease in price then i will get the loading screen? or are they all needed for it?

Only one is needed, you don't need the whole set. 

PROJECT: Yi will not go on sale next week, since legendary skins do not go on sale when they're initially released. If you're planning on getting him, I'd say get him this week so you get the First Strike loading screen. :]

Lol no. They are actually testing a reverse sale tactic where the skin is intentionally overpriced at launch, then goes to normal price a week later.

The only one I will be buying day one is {{champion:11}}, simply because his price will never change and seeing as he is one of my favorite champs I was going to buy the skin anyway and might as well get the border for "free".

Other than that, I recommend you not give into this predatory business tactic as that would encourage them to try it again. I find it dishonest that they would inflate the price of the skin at release.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=l0T36wJZ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-09-08T21:16:07.803+0000)
>
> Lol no. They are actually testing a reverse sale tactic where the skin is intentionally overpriced at launch, then goes to normal price a week later.
> 
> The only one I will be buying day one is {{champion:11}}, simply because his price will never change and seeing as he is one of my favorite champs I was going to buy the skin anyway and might as well get the border for "free".
> 
> Other than that, I recommend you not give into this predatory business tactic as that would encourage them to try it again. I find it dishonest that they would inflate the price of the skin at release.

grow up. it's an exclusive border for buying it full price, i like the deal. It isn't predatory at all. So please, if you don't like this type of sale, then don't buy em. Don't try to ruin it for the ones that do want it.

No, the first week is "First Strike" The skins will be full price, but will also unlock a special loading card border for the skin. The second week the skins will be on sale for a week, but will not include the border.

EDIT: Also during First Strike Project Yasuo will be on sale for 50% off
iight thank you for the info XD
